flowchart.controls.modes.mouse.title: Using mouse mode
flowchart.controls.modes.mouse.helper:
-Keep the middle button pressed to move in the flowchart
-Scroll to zoom.
flowchart.controls.modes.keyboard.title: Using keyboard mode
flowchart.controls.modes.keyboard.helper:
-Scroll to move up and down.
-Keep MAJ pressed while scrolling in order to scroll left and right.
-Keep CTRL pressed while scrolling to adjust zoom.
